articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Russian Agreement Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Russian Agreement Observed
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition was opened at the Pyongyang International Cultural Center on Monday to mark the 60th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 On display in the venue of an opening ceremony were photos showing historic activities of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il for the development of the bilateral friendly relations and the achievements of the Russian people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the KCCRFC and chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy were on hand.
					
					Speakers at the ceremony said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have entered a new higher stage through several meetings held between Kim Jong Il and former President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin in the new century and the joint documents adopted in this course.
					
					 They stressed that the photo exhibition would provide a significant occasion in consolidating the bonds of friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The participants looked around the photos on display.
					
					 Then they appreciated a feature film "Everlasting Comrade-in-Arms" (Parts 1 and 2) at the Chollima Hall of Culture.

articles.title: Party Delegation of European Parliament Arrives
articles.content:
Party Delegation of European Parliament Arrives
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Group of Social Parties of the European Parliament arrived here Monday by air.

articles.title: "Kwangmyong Encyclopedia" Published
articles.content:
"Kwangmyong Encyclopedia" Published
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Science and Encyclopedia Press of the DPRK has recently brought out the book "Kwangmyong Encyclopedia" on world geography, mathematics and sports.
					 The dictionary "Geography of the World" gives general knowledge on the world geography according to geographical departmental systems in the scale of continent and knowledge on each region and each country of continents on the basis of physical geographical and historical data.
					
					 Edited in detail in the dictionary "Mathematics" with 4 parts and 28 chapters are general knowledge showing the basic contents and historical development of the mathematics.
					
					 The dictionary "Sports" consists of 3 parts and 15 chapters, which contains general theory on physical culture and sports, each sports event and all-round sports contests, and an appendix dealing with main sports facilities of the DPRK.
					
					 The press will publish "Kwangmyong Encyclopedia" which consists of 20 volumes giving the knowledge on the world history, politics, law, philosophy, economy, education, linguistics and other fields.

articles.title: "1,000-ri Journey for Learning" Is Carried forward
articles.content:
"1,000-ri Journey for Learning" Is Carried forward
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The exploration march "1,000-ri journey for learning" is being carried forward by school children in the DPRK.
					 The Korean people call the journey covered by President Kim Il Sung in his childhood in Juche 12 (1923) "1,000-ri journey for learning".
					
					 True to the high intention of his father that a man born in Korea had to have a good knowledge of Korea for winning back the country occupied by the Japanese imperialists, President Kim Il Sung left Badaogou of China on March 16, 1923 and walked alone the long rough road from Badaogou to Mangyongdae, his home town.The President wrote in his reminiscences "With the Century" about the 1,000-ri journey as follows:
					
					 "The 1,000-ri journey was, for me, a journey of learning about my homeland and my fellow countrymen".
					
					 The course from Phophyong across the River Amnok to Mangyongdae was very arduous for him as he had to go through biting wind and blizzard.What was more painful than his personal fatigue was to witness the reality of the country trampled down and exploited by the Japanese imperialists during the journey.
					
					 The miserable reality of the country had burned his heart with hatred against the Japanese imperialists who had converted the whole land of the country into a living hell.
					
					 Overcoming all difficulties and severe cold, the President arrived in Mangyongdae, his native village, at the end of the 10-odd days journey.
					
					 Marching along the course of "1,000-ri journey for learning", school children are preparing themselves as pillars of the Songun era and reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche, following the lofty intention of the President.
					
					 The exploration march has been held annually since March 1974.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Foolish Talk about "Dialogue" Lambasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Foolish Talk about "Dialogue" Lambasted
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak during his recent foreign trip talked nonsense that he wanted the "developed south-north relations based on the co-existence and co-prosperity", "he was ready to have dialogue with the north" and "he expected dialogue and cooperation." His mandarins vied with each other to let loose rhetoric that "the door is open to the south-north dialogue" and "the north should come out for dialogue" and "contact".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is great irony that those who bedeviled the inter-Korean relations by blocking dialogue and cooperation between compatriots have now the effrontery to raise their heads and talk about "dialogue".
					
					 What the Lee group uttered about "dialogue" and "contact" with the DPRK is nothing but poor chicanery to evade at any cost the responsibility for having brought the inter-Korean ties to stalemate and mislead the pubic opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The Lee group has not uttered even a single word of apology for the unpardonable crimes it has committed against reunification by dashing even the slightest hope for the inter-Korean dialogue and creating such grave situation on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out any moment. Nevertheless, this group has gone the lengths of admonishing the DPRK over the issue of "dialogue" like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" This behavior is intolerable, indeed. It only lays bare the deceptive and reactionary nature of the traitorous clique's ballyhoo about "dialogue." 
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the inter-Korean ties will never be improved as long as such most wicked confrontational maniacs, traitors to the nation as Lee stay in power.
					
					 It is the only way of settling the issue to force Lee to step down.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to stop such foolish talk about "dialogue" and immediately step down as unanimously demanded by all Koreans.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Urged to Drop Bitterness towards Compatriots
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Urged to Drop Bitterness towards Compatriots
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- If the Koreans are to remove the hurdle lying in the way of the reunification movement and accomplish the national cause of independent reunification, peace and prosperity as soon as possible, they should decisively foil the criminal moves of the Lee Myung Bak group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, antagonizing fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces, observes Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 Bitterness towards fellow countrymen is a main factor of stoking the mistrust between the north and the south and pushing the north-south relations to catastrophe, a check-bar blocking the dialogue, cooperation, contact and travel between the north and the south and a dangerous source of military confrontation and a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 What is important for the inter-Korean dialogue and contact is to properly regard fellow countrymen as a genuine partner in the process for reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, however, malignantly defiled the June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration as "pro-communist, enemy-benefiting documents" and described "By our nation itself," the main spirit of the inter-Korean joint declarations, as "narrow-minded nationalism" and "chauvinist nationalism." 
					
					 After giving top priority to the "improvement of the relations" with the U.S. and Japan the Lee group has closed the door to the travel, contact, dialogue and negotiations with fellow countrymen and  busied itself serving foreign forces, staking its fate on depending upon them. 
					
					 The reckless moves of the Lee group to do harm to fellow countrymen by force of arms have created such dangerous situation on the Korean Peninsula that any accident may trigger off a new war.
					
					 Absolutely unpardonable is the Lee group which has persisted in such hostile acts against fellow countrymen quite contrary to the aspiration and desire of all Koreans for independent reunification, peace and prosperity, thus driving the inter-Korean relations to collapse and increasing the danger of a war of aggression against the DPRK as the days go by.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redress Its Crime-Woven Past
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redress Its Crime-Woven Past
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- If Japan is to earn international confidence and shake off the ill-fame of being an enemy state it should completely break with its crime-woven history by taking practical actions, urges Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary. 
					 Referring to the fact that the German government has decided again to donate a large mount of money to Poland to help it preserve its relics, the commentary notes: For several decades the German government has paid reparation for the crimes Germany committed against humanity during the Second World War after honestly admitting them. This gesture was prompted by its political will not to repeat such crimes. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japan is behaving meanly and shamelessly quite contrary to Germany's gesture, though it committed similar crimes against humanity.
					
					 Japan has made neither honest repentance nor due reparation for its hideous crimes committed against humanity in the past. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have become zealous in their moves to whitewash and justify the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists, much less redressing them. Japan went so mean as to burn up and destroy the documents about those crimes for fear of their disclosure. They are letting loose rhetoric that the issue of redressing the past has been already settled. This is like burying one's head ostrich-like in the sand. 
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for Japan to make a desperate bid for permanent membership of the UN Security Council, hyping its "economic potential" and its contribution to the UN though it has not yet shaken off the ill-fame as an enemy state. 
					
					 Japan's settlement of its past is a barometer showing whether it has the will to break with its militarist past and turn over a new leaf or not and whether it is serious about gaining international confidence or wishes to remain isolated from the international community. 
					
					 It would be well advised to face up to the international trend and take an option for redressing its past as early as possible, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: AINDF Calls for Struggle against War Maneuvers
articles.content:
AINDF Calls for Struggle against War Maneuvers
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front made public an "appeal to all the people" on March 14, according to Kuguk Jonson (Internet).
					 Noting that south Korea is at the critical crossroad of war and peace due to the frantic Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group, the appeal said:
					
					 It is the south Korean people who are responsible for preventing the disaster of a nuclear war being sought by outside forces and their stooges and who have power to check the war and defend peace. The people from all walks of life should turn out in the nationwide resistance to baffle the dangerous war exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak bellicose forces for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor troops are the root cause of all misfortunes and sufferings of the south Korean people and a hotbed of the war against the DPRK. Therefore, all the people should dynamically wage the struggle to put an end to the U.S. military occupation and domination over south Korea under the banner of independence against the U.S.
					
					 The appeal described the report of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the statement of a spokesman for the KPA General Staff as the most just self-defensive measure reflecting the aspiration and will of all the Koreans to defend the dignity and interests of the nation.
					
					 Over the past years every scheme of the warlike forces to ignite a war against the DPRK has been frustrated by its tremendous war deterrent, it noted, calling upon all the south Korean people to fully support and defend the DPRK's Songun politics, pride of the nation and treasured sword for peace.
					
					 It called for vigorously waging the struggle for peace against war, full of confidence in sure victory, while regarding the strong war deterrent of the DPRK as the great wealth of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Unpopular Educational Policy Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Unpopular Educational Policy Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- At least 280 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Teachers' Union and the Society of Parents of Students for Genuine Education held a press conference in Seoul on March 12 denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak's unpopular educational policy.
					 The organizations condemned Lee for having totally frustrated education while making a retrogressive revision of textbooks since he came to power.
					
					 They also accused the authorities of cracking down upon the teachers who protested against their unreasonable educational policy.
					
					 They demanded Lee admit his incapacity and drop his unpopular educational policy.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Military Exercises Denounced by Organizations of Czech Republic
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Military Exercises Denounced by Organizations of Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 10 to denounce the joint military exercises of the U.S and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					 The statement said that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises staged with the huge aggression armed forces involved are another proof showing that the new U.S. administration's promise to settle the issue of the Korean Peninsula through dialogue is nothing but rhetoric and that the U.S. remains unchanged in its ambition for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The exercises are a very dangerous provocation which can be seen only on the eve of war and an undisguised military threat and a declaration of war, it stressed.
					
					 Noting that the unpredictable dangerous situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative authorities, the statement expressed full support for the report of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the statement of a spokesman for the KPA General Staff issued to cope with it.
					
					 It strongly demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop at once the adventurous and aggressive joint military exercises against the DPRK and that the U.S. withdraw all its aggression armed forces from south Korea immediately.
					
					 The Communist Youth Movement of Czechoslovakia, too, released a statement on the same day, condemning the said provocative joint military exercises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia entrenamiento de artilleria de la Unidad No. 1811
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia entrenamiento de artilleria de la Unidad No. 1811
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Unidad No. 1811 subordinada a la Comandancia de Artilleria del EPC y presencio una practica de tiro de canones.
					  Le acogieron en el lugar el comandante de Artilleria del EPC, coronel general Ri Jong Bu, y otros generales y los comandantes de la citada unidad.
					
					  Tras hacer conocimiento del estado de cumplimiento de la guardia avanzada por la unidad, el Comandante Supremo subio al observatorio donde escucho las explicaciones del comandante de Artilleria sobre el plan de ejercicios y vio un entrenamiento del fuego de la bateria.
					
					Este ejercicio devino una muestra directa y viva de la resuelta determinacion de los militares del EPC, que estan llenos de la voluntad de aniquilar de un golpe a los agresores y defender de modo inexpugnable la patria socialista si los enemigos se atreven a invadir 0.001mmde la tierra, el mar y el cielo de la patria, y del verdadero aspecto de su implacable poderio de golpe.
					
					  Al ver el intrepido ejercicio de los artilleros del EPC capaces de uno vs. cien enemigos, se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos ellos se prepararon firmemente tanto en lo ideo-politico como en lo tecnico-militar con la capacidad de defender inexpugnablemente la patria socialista frustrando a tiempo cualquier invasion sorpresiva de los enemigos.
					
					Tras apreciar altamente los exitos logrados en el ejercicio, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para fortalecer el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					  Los uniformados del EPC, magnifico heredero de las brillantes tradiciones de la guerra antijaponesa, se han formado como combatientes portadores del espiritu de defender al Lider a costa de la vida, que dan sin vacilacion alguna su juventud y vida para el partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo, y se han fortalecido como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dotadas de modernos medios de ataque y defensa, destaco.
					
					Continuo que gracias a estas invencibles filas de acero y de flor y nata,  forjadas en las dos guerras antiimperialistas de gran envergadura y la ardua y larga lucha, nuestra fortaleza socialista es indestructible y nuestra causa revolucionaria marchara siempre victoriosa.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se reunio con los militares participantes en el ejercicio estimulandolos cordialmente y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, vicemariscal del EPC, Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC, Ri Yong Ho, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, los coroneles generales del EPC, Kim Won Hong y Han Tong Gun, y otros miembros directivos del EPC asi como los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, incluyendo al secretario Kim Ki Nam.

articles.title: Actos por 60o aniversario de convenio entre Corea y Rusia
articles.content:
Actos por 60o aniversario de convenio entre Corea y Rusia
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada este lunes en la Casa Internacional de Cultura de Pyongyang la exposicion de fotos dedicada al aniversario 60 de la concertacion del Convenio sobre la Cooperacion Economica y Cultural entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa.
					En la sede de ceremonia fueron expuestas las fotos que muestran las historicas actividades del Presidente        Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il para desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre Corea y Rusia y los exitos logrados por el pueblo ruso.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el presidente interino del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero (CCRCE), Mun Jae Chol, la presidenta de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia (AACR) y vicepresidenta del CCRCE Hong Son Ok, y otros funcionarios, asi como trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes el embajador Valery Sukhinin y otros miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea.
					
					En el acto, los oradores se refirieron a que el encuentro entre el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el ex presidente ruso Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin se realizo en varias ocasiones  en el nuevo siglo y, en ese proceso fueron aprobados los documentos conjuntos, gracias a lo cual las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises entraron en nueva etapa alta.
					
					La presente exposicion servira de un motivo significante para consolidar los lazos de amistad entre ambos pueblos, subrayaron.
					
					A continuacion, los participantes vieron las fotos expuestas.
					
					El mismo dia, los participantes vieron en la Casa Cultural Chollima la pelicula de ficcion "Un eterno companero de armas" (1,2 partes).

articles.title: Editados diccionarios componentes de "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong"
articles.content:
Editados diccionarios componentes de "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong"
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Editorial Ciencias y Enciclopedias de Corea acabo de editar los tomos de la "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong" sobre la geografia, la matematica y el deporte del mundo.
					 El diccionario "Geografia mundial" brinda los conocimientos generales sobre la geografia mundial segun sus ramas y continentes.
					
					 Ademas, sintetiza los conocimientos de las regiones y paises de cada continente a base de los datos geograficos y hechos historicos.
					
					  El "Matematica", que consta de 4 partes y 28 capitulos, ofrece en detalles los conocimientos generales sobre el contenido principal de esta asignatura y la historia de su desarrollo.
					
					 El "Deporte" con 3 partes, 15 capitulos y apendice anota las teorias deportivas comunes y los resultados de los eventos por disciplinas o universales.
					
					 En su apendice estan senalados los importantes establecimientos deportivos de Corea.
					
					  La "Enciclopedia Kwangmyong" tendra 20 tomos en total y tratara la historia, la politica, el derecho, la filosofia, la economia, la educacion, la linguistica del mundo, entre otras ramas.

articles.title: Entidades checas condenan "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho"
articles.content:
Entidades checas condenan  "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho"
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de amistad Checo-Corea Paektusan y el Grupo Checo de Estudio y Materializacion de la Idea Juche hicieron publica el dia 10 la declaracion conjunta condenando a los simulacros conjuntos de Estados Unidos y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas.
					  Estos simulacros en que participan enormes fuerzas armadas agresivas muestran que la promesa de la nueva administracion norteamericana de solucionar mediante el dialogo el problema de la Peninsula Coreana no pasa de ser un culteranismo y que es invariable la ambicion agresiva de EE.UU. contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, insiste la declaracion.
					
					  Tambien, devienen el extremadamente peligroso acto provocativo, la abierta amenaza militar y la declaracion de guerra que se posibilitan en la vispera de la guerra, enfatiza.
					
					  Debido a las maniobras belicas de EE.UU. y las autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea  se crea la situacion muy peligrosa en la Peninsula Coreana, senala la declaracion y expresa irrestricto apoyo a la informacion de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea y la declaracion del portavoz del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					  Demanda energicamente a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea el cese inmediato de los aventureros y agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos contra la RPDC y la retirada pronta de todas las fuerzas armadas agresivas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea.
					
					  El mismo dia, el Movimiento de la Juventud Comunista de Checoslovaquia hizo publica una declaracion oponiendose a las provocativas maniobras militares de EE.UU. y las autoridades titeres del Sur de Corea.
